channel.title: The current moderators are fine
channel.description:
But we need more moderators, so we can be sure at least one is online whenever needed. Just needing to point this issue out, hearing about a lot of griefing, etc.
P.S. PVP still sucks and I won't be playing the server til it's controlled (PVP days) or removed.

item.title: The current moderators are fine
item.dc:creator: @xxxxxx_13 xxxxxx 13
item.description:
@xxxxxx_13 wrote:

[quote=“Pblord7, post:15, topic:378071”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=473957.msg3465513#msg3465513 date=1294864268]
Accounts should have to be vitrified on the first login
[/quote]
Hes saying like, if you’ve ever been in a MW2 10th Lobby you verified by the leader of mods before getting in the game for real.[/quote]
That would be a turn off. Time zone issues? Beyond that. If i make my name. Nice Guy. Oh neat I must be nice so lets approve me. Just because you approve someone doesn’t make them not want to grief. They could play for a day then grief. See thats not a solution. I honestly don’t think there really is one. We just keep rebuilding the destruction. Its a part of life.(the game)

Awesome I love sly. Hes a great guy.
